author: potuz
content: How can I disable ethresear.ch from taking over my CTRL+F shortcut to search within a post? The search function on the site sucks badly

author: sky.cactus
content: I believe this is a Discourse (the forum software used) feature, not specific to ethresear.ch.

author: sky.cactus
content: You may be able to search online for information on how to disable Discourse from taking over your ctrl-f?
